475  {
476  // Split by groups of nodes
477  size_t m = my_end.my_index-my_begin.my_index;
478  if( m > my_grainsize ) {
479  m = my_begin.my_index + m/2u;
480  hash_map_base::bucket *b = my_begin.my_map->get_bucket(m);

482  } else {
